Primary Sources.Title: Single cell RNA sequencing of lung adenocarcinoma
Primary Sources.Coverage: Primary tumors, lymph nodes, brain metastases, pleural effusion, normal lung tissues

Reprogramming of Tumor-infiltrating Immune Cells in Early Stage of NSCLC
Primary Sources.Samples: 8 samples (4 tumor + 4 adjacent normal from treatment-naive NSCLC patients)
Primary Sources.Coverage: Early-stage NSCLC with immune cell mapping from TCGA (44 NSCLC + adjacent normal)

Primary Sources.Title: The Cancer Genome Atlas - Lung Adenocarcinoma
Primary Sources.Type: Bulk RNA-seq, WES, methylation, CNV, clinical data
Primary Sources.Samples: 522 tumor samples + 59 healthy lung tissue samples

Primary Sources.Title: Validation cohort for LUAD prognostic models

Human Lung adenocarcinoma - Tumor-infilt.Key Immune Cells Identified: CD8+ T cells, NK cells, M1/M2 macrophages, CD14+ monocytes, myeloid-derived suppressor cells
Human Lung adenocarcinoma - Tumor-infilt.Key Features: Dynamic myeloid reprogramming, monocyte-to-macrophage differentiation paths

Primary Sources.Title: Single-cell RNA-seq reveals immune landscape of pancreatic cancer
Primary Sources.Samples: 6 PDAC samples + 3 adjacent normal pancreatic samples
Primary Sources.Coverage: Immune profiling between PDAC and adjacent normal pancreatic tissues

Primary Sources.Title: Local and systemic immune profiles of human pancreatic cancer
Primary Sources.Coverage: PDAC tumors, non-malignant pancreatic tissue, regional lymph nodes, spleen, portal vein blood, peripheral blood
Primary Sources.Immune Markers: 41 immune cell markers measured by mass cytometry

Primary Sources.Title: Spatially resolved multi-omics single-cell analyses inform mechanisms of immune-dysfunction in pancreatic cancer
The Cancer Genome Atlas - Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma
Primary Sources.Type: Bulk RNA-seq, methylation, mutation, RPPA, clinical data

Primary Sources.Title: A Single-Cell Atlas of Tumor-Infiltrating Immune Cells in Pancreatic Cancer
Primary Sources.Samples: PDAC tumors from 12 patients (8 PDAC + 2 CP tumors), 9 PBMC samples
Primary Sources.Coverage: PDAC tumors, normal pancreatic tissues, chronic pancreatitis tissues, peripheral blood

Human Pancreatic cancer - PDAC immune mi.Key Immune Cells Identified: CD8+ T cells, B cells, regulatory T cells (Tregs), macrophages (M1/M2), innate lymphoid cells (ILC1-like), MDSCs
Human Pancreatic cancer - PDAC immune mi.Key Features: Immunosuppressive landscape, increased Tregs and B cells, depletion of cytotoxic CD8+ T cells

Primary Sources.Title: scRNA-seq profiling of breast cancer tumors, BRCA1 mutant pre-neoplastic mammary gland cells and normal mammary gland cells
Primary Sources.Coverage: 4 TNBC, 4 BRCA1 TNBC, 6 HER2+, 19 ER+, 6 lymph node metastases, 13 normal mammary gland, 4 pre-neoplastic BRCA1

Primary Sources.Title: A Single-Cell Atlas of the Breast Cancer Microenvironment
Primary Sources.Samples: 31 integrated datasets totaling 1.2 million cells from 376 samples
Primary Sources.Coverage: Breast cancer subtypes (TNBC, Luminal A, Luminal B, HER2+) with distinct immune signatures

Primary Sources.Title: Immune landscape in estrogen receptor positive breast cancer
Primary Sources.Samples: 53 ER+ IDC and 65 ER+ ILC tumor samples analyzed by mIHC; flow cytometry cohort
Primary Sources.Coverage: ER+ invasive ductal carcinoma (IDC) and invasive lobular carcinoma (ILC)

Primary Sources.Title: The Cancer Genome Atlas - Breast Cancer
Primary Sources.Type: Bulk RNA-seq, mutation, methylation, CNV, clinical data
Primary Sources.Samples: 1080 breast cancer samples with multi-omics profiles

Primary Sources.Title: Breast cancer transcriptome validation cohort

Human Breast cancer - Breast tumor immun.Key Immune Cells Identified: Macrophages (M1/M2), T cells (CD4+, CD8+), B cells, plasma cells, dendritic cells, Tregs
Human Breast cancer - Breast tumor immun.Key Features: Subtype-specific immune signatures (TNBC: proliferative T cells; ER+: cycling macrophages), immune exclusion in ER+ tumors

Primary Sources.Coverage: Primary tumors with complete survival and clinical data

Human Lung adenocarcinoma - Bulk tumor v.Sample Size: 500+ primary LUAD tumors with complete data

Primary Sources.Title: Early-stage NSCLC immune reprogramming
Primary Sources.Type: scRNA-seq comparison: tumor vs adjacent normal
Primary Sources.Samples: 4 treatment-naive NSCLC patients (4 tumor + 4 adjacent normal)
Primary Sources.Coverage: Immune landscape changes from normal to early-stage NSCLC
Primary Sources.Key Comparison: CD8+ T cells, NK cells, myeloid cells between tumor and adjacent normal tissues

Primary Sources.Title: Immune infiltration in NSCLC vs normal lung
Primary Sources.Samples: 44 NSCLC tumors + 44 adjacent normal samples from TCGA
Primary Sources.Immune Inference: Using CIBERSORT and other deconvolution algorithms
Primary Sources.Coverage: Heterogeneous patterns of immune cell alterations

Primary Sources.Title: LUAD vs normal lung tissue comparison
Primary Sources.Normal Samples: 10 distant normal lung tissues, 10 normal lymph nodes
Primary Sources.Coverage: Comprehensive cell atlas including immune comparison

Primary Sources.Title: Immune biology of NSCLC revealed by single-cell proteomic analysis
Primary Sources.Coverage: 9 major immune populations: CD8+ T, CD4+ T, Tregs, NK, NKT, B cells, granulocytes, macrophages, DCs
Primary Sources.Key Finding: CD62L+ CD4+ T cell enrichment in responders vs non-responders

Healthy vs NSCLC - Immune cell compariso.Key Comparisons: Immune infiltration patterns, T cell exhaustion, myeloid differentiation, NK cell abundance
Healthy vs NSCLC - Immune cell compariso.Sample Numbers: 44 NSCLC + matching adjacent normal from TCGA; 4 NSCLC + 4 normal from GSE117570
